ygData.subject: Re: I won my dream item!!
ygData.msgSnippet: ... snip ... Oh, the pain the pain ;P.  Congratulations to you! You didn t mention how you broke it.  Did you split with lament or? //Maravana Vireo //50th
ygData.messageBody:
> I got my Flowing Black Silk Sash last night, and I only had to camp an hour
> for it.
snip
> Madagan Songweaver, Bard of 39 Songs <Guardians of Light>
> Meklon, Level 12 Cleric of Innoruuk <Lords of Chaos>
> Veeshan Server

Oh, the pain the pain ;P. Congratulations to you!

You didn't mention how you broke it. Did you split with lament or?


//Maravana Vireo
//50th Bard of Jus Divinum, Mithaniel Marr
(who has a sash as a present from her oh-so-generous husband Knight but doesn't feel
guilty having definitely put in the time in Frenzied for it!)
